personal_info.name: Raj Shukla
personal_info.title: Computer Science Student & Machine Learning Enthusiast
personal_info.bio: Passionate Computer Science student specializing in Machine Learning and AI. Currently pursuing CSE at Lovely Professional University with hands-on experience in developing AI models for healthcare and recommendation systems.

projects.title: Identifying Skin Cancer Types
projects.description: Developed an AI model to classify skin cancer types (melanoma, nevus, seborrheic keratosis) accurately from dermoscopic images, overcoming issues like class imbalance and low lesion contrast.
projects.approach: Used EfficientNet-B6 with transfer learning, optimized color feature extraction, and metadata integration to enhance model accuracy and generalization.
projects.results: Achieved an AUC-ROC score of 0.9681 and an accuracy of 98.61%, outperforming existing models.

projects.title: News Article Recommendation Engine
projects.description: Users often struggle to find relevant news articles based on their interests. This system aims to recommend news articles based on user input.
projects.approach: Implemented TF-IDF (Term Frequency-Inverse Document Frequency) and Cosine Similarity to analyze and rank articles based on relevance to a given title or keywords.
projects.results: Achieved high accuracy in recommending relevant articles by optimizing text preprocessing and vectorization techniques.

experience.title: Machine Learning Intern
experience.description: Successfully completed an internship focused on Machine Learning. Gained practical experience in model training, evaluation, and deployment. Worked on real-world problems using Python, Scikit-learn, and TensorFlow.

achievements.title: LeetCode Problem Solver
achievements.description: Solved over 150+ LeetCode questions of easy and medium level
